message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. This is still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to save some more money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $16500. This is still a good deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
